pkgmetadata.longdescription: Coarse Approximation Linear Function // Forward selection linear regression greedy algorithm where selection is driven by optimization of Welch t-test p-value or AUC (binary dependent vector), or Pearson correlation (nonbinary). Functions now enabled include data outputs for permutation tests of several types plus cross-validation features. Please see preprint at https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.03.27.011700v1 or doi:10.1101/2020.03.27.011700.
